dn6:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
dn6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula kosalaka ca brahmanaduta magadhaka ca brahmanaduta vesaliyam pativasanti kenacideva karaniyena.
dn6:1.4: Assosum kho te kosalaka ca brahmanaduta magadhaka ca brahmanaduta:
dn6:1.5: “samano khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
dn6:1.6: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
dn6:1.7: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’.
dn6:1.8: So imam lokam sadevakam samarakam sabrahmakam sassamanabrahmanim pajam sadevamanussam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti.
dn6:1.9: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
dn6:1.10: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
dn6:2.1: Atha kho te kosalaka ca brahmanaduta magadhaka ca brahmanaduta yena mahavanam kutagarasala tenupasankamimsu.
dn6:2.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma nagito bhagavato upatthako hoti.
dn6:2.3: Atha kho te kosalaka ca brahmanaduta magadhaka ca brahmanaduta yenayasma nagito tenupasankamimsu. upasankamitva ayasmantam nagitam etadavocum:
dn6:2.4: “kaham nu kho, bho nagita, etarahi so bhavam gotamo viharati?
dn6:2.5: Dassanakama hi mayam tam bhavantam gotaman”ti.
dn6:2.6: “Akalo kho, avuso, bhagavantam dassanaya, patisallino bhagava”ti.
dn6:2.7: Atha kho te kosalaka ca brahmanaduta magadhaka ca brahmanaduta tattheva ekamantam nisidimsu:
dn6:3.1: Otthaddhopi licchavi mahatiya licchaviparisaya saddhim yena mahavanam kutagarasala yenayasma nagito tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam nagitam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho otthaddhopi licchavi ayasmantam nagitam etadavoca:
dn6:3.2: “kaham nu kho, bhante nagita, etarahi so bhagava viharati araham sammasambuddho,
dn6:3.3: dassanakama hi mayam tam bhagavantam arahantam sammasambuddhan”ti.
dn6:3.4: “Akalo kho, mahali, bhagavantam dassanaya, patisallino bhagava”ti.
dn6:3.6: “disvava aham tam bhagavantam gamissami arahantam sammasambuddhan”ti.
dn6:4.1: Atha kho siho samanuddeso yenayasma nagito tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam nagitam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho siho samanuddeso ayasmantam nagitam etadavoca:
dn6:4.2: “ete, bhante kassapa, sambahula kosalaka ca brahmanaduta magadhaka ca brahmanaduta idhupasankanta bhagavantam dassanaya; otthaddhopi licchavi mahatiya licchaviparisaya saddhim idhupasankanto bhagavantam dassanaya, sadhu, bhante kassapa, labhatam esa janata bhagavantam dassanaya”ti.
dn6:4.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho siho samanuddeso ayasmato nagitassa patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho siho samanuddeso bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn6:4.5: “ete, bhante, sambahula kosalaka ca brahmanaduta magadhaka ca brahmanaduta idhupasankanta bhagavantam dassanaya, otthaddhopi licchavi mahatiya licchaviparisaya saddhim idhupasankanto bhagavantam dassanaya.
dn6:4.6: Sadhu, bhante, labhatam esa janata bhagavantam dassanaya”ti.
dn6:4.8: “Evam, bhante”ti kho siho samanuddeso bhagavato patissutva viharapacchayayam asanam pannapesi.
dn6:4.9: Atha kho bhagava vihara nikkhamma viharapacchayayam pannatte asane nisidi.
dn6:5.1: Atha kho te kosalaka ca brahmanaduta magadhaka ca brahmanaduta yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodimsu.
dn6:5.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu.
dn6:5.3: Otthaddhopi licchavi mahatiya licchaviparisaya saddhim yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho otthaddho licchavi bhagavantam etadavoca: “purimani, bhante, divasani purimatarani sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam etadavoca:
dn6:5.4: ‘yadagge aham, mahali, bhagavantam upanissaya viharami, na ciram tini vassani, dibbani hi kho rupani passami piyarupani kamupasamhitani rajaniyani, no ca kho dibbani saddani sunami piyarupani kamupasamhitani rajaniyani’ti.
dn6:5.5: Santaneva nu kho, bhante, sunakkhatto licchaviputto dibbani saddani nassosi piyarupani kamupasamhitani rajaniyani, udahu asantani”ti?
dn6:5.7: “Santaneva kho, mahali, sunakkhatto licchaviputto dibbani saddani nassosi piyarupani kamupasamhitani rajaniyani, no asantani”ti.
dn6:6.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena santaneva sunakkhatto licchaviputto dibbani saddani nassosi piyarupani kamupasamhitani rajaniyani, no asantani”ti?
dn6:6.2: “Idha, mahali, bhikkhuno puratthimaya disaya ekamsabhavito samadhi hoti dibbanam rupanam dassanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam, no ca kho dibbanam saddanam savanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam.
dn6:6.3: So puratthimaya disaya ekamsabhavite samadhimhi dibbanam rupanam dassanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam, no ca kho dibbanam saddanam savanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam.
dn6:6.4: Puratthimaya disaya dibbani rupani passati piyarupani kamupasamhitani rajaniyani, no ca kho dibbani saddani sunati piyarupani kamupasamhitani rajaniyani.
dn6:6.6: Evanhetam, mahali, hoti bhikkhuno puratthimaya disaya ekamsabhavite samadhimhi dibbanam rupanam dassanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam, no ca kho dibbanam saddanam savanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam.
dn6:7.1: Puna caparam, mahali, bhikkhuno dakkhinaya disaya …pe…
dn6:7.4: uddhamadho tiriyam ekamsabhavito samadhi hoti dibbanam rupanam dassanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam, no ca kho dibbanam saddanam savanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam.
dn6:7.5: So uddhamadho tiriyam ekamsabhavite samadhimhi dibbanam rupanam dassanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam, no ca kho dibbanam saddanam savanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam.

dn6:10.1: Idha, mahali, bhikkhuno puratthimaya disaya ubhayamsabhavito samadhi hoti dibbananca rupanam dassanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam dibbananca saddanam savanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam.
dn6:10.2: So puratthimaya disaya ubhayamsabhavite samadhimhi dibbananca rupanam dassanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam, dibbananca saddanam savanaya piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam.
dn6:10.3: Puratthimaya disaya dibbani ca rupani passati piyarupani kamupasamhitani rajaniyani, dibbani ca saddani sunati piyarupani kamupasamhitani rajaniyani.

dn6:12.1: “Etasam nuna, bhante, samadhibhavananam sacchikiriyahetu bhikkhu bhagavati brahmacariyam caranti”ti.
dn6:12.2: “Na kho, mahali, etasam samadhibhavananam sacchikiriyahetu bhikkhu mayi brahmacariyam caranti.
dn6:12.3: Atthi kho, mahali, anneva dhamma uttaritara ca panitatara ca, yesam sacchikiriyahetu bhikkhu mayi brahmacariyam caranti”ti.
dn6:13.1: “Katame pana te, bhante, dhamma uttaritara ca panitatara ca, yesam sacchikiriyahetu bhikkhu bhagavati brahmacariyam caranti”ti?
dn6:13.2: “Idha, mahali, bhikkhu tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
dn6:13.3: Ayampi kho, mahali, dhammo uttaritaro ca panitataro ca, yassa sacchikiriyahetu bhikkhu mayi brahmacariyam caranti.
dn6:13.4: Puna caparam, mahali, bhikkhu tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagami hoti, sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karoti.
dn6:13.5: Ayampi kho, mahali, dhammo uttaritaro ca panitataro ca, yassa sacchikiriyahetu bhikkhu mayi brahmacariyam caranti.
dn6:13.6: Puna caparam, mahali, bhikkhu pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti, tattha parinibbayi, anavattidhammo tasma loka.
dn6:13.7: Ayampi kho, mahali, dhammo uttaritaro ca panitataro ca, yassa sacchikiriyahetu bhikkhu mayi brahmacariyam caranti.
dn6:13.8: Puna caparam, mahali, bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
dn6:13.9: Ayampi kho, mahali, dhammo uttaritaro ca panitataro ca, yassa sacchikiriyahetu bhikkhu mayi brahmacariyam caranti.
dn6:13.10: Ime kho te, mahali, dhamma uttaritara ca panitatara ca, yesam sacchikiriyahetu bhikkhu mayi brahmacariyam caranti”ti.
dn6:14.1: “Atthi pana, bhante, maggo atthi patipada etesam dhammanam sacchikiriyaya”ti?
dn6:14.2: “Atthi kho, mahali, maggo atthi patipada etesam dhammanam sacchikiriyaya”ti.
dn6:14.3: “Katamo pana, bhante, maggo katama patipada etesam dhammanam sacchikiriyaya”ti?
dn6:14.5: Seyyathidam—sammaditthi sammasankappo sammavaca sammakammanto sammaajivo sammavayamo sammasati sammasamadhi.
dn6:14.6: Ayam kho, mahali, maggo ayam patipada etesam dhammanam sacchikiriyaya.
dn6:15.1: Ekamidaham, mahali, samayam kosambiyam viharami ghositarame.
dn6:15.3: mundiyo ca paribbajako jaliyo ca darupattikantevasi yenaham tenupasankamimsu. upasankamitva maya saddhim sammodimsu.
dn6:15.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho te dve pabbajita mam etadavocum:
dn6:15.5: ‘kim nu kho, avuso gotama, tam jivam tam sariram, udahu annam jivam annam sariran’ti?
dn6:16.1: ‘Tena havuso, sunatha sadhukam manasi karotha bhasissami’ti.
dn6:16.2: ‘Evamavuso’ti kho te dve pabbajita mama paccassosum.
dn6:16.5: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu silasampanno hoti.
dn6:16.8: Yo kho, avuso, bhikkhu evam janati evam passati, kallam nu kho tassetam vacanaya:
dn6:16.9: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti vati?
dn6:16.10: Yo so, avuso, bhikkhu evam janati evam passati, kallam tassetam vacanaya:
dn6:16.11: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va, ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti vati.
dn6:16.12: Aham kho panetam, avuso, evam janami evam passami.
dn6:16.14: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti va …pe…
